TitleEnglish: Sinbad: The Flying Princess and the Secret Island Part 1
SummaryEnglish: A hardworking and curious boy named SINBAD dreams of becoming a sailor and traveling around the world. One day, he encounters a mysterious girl on a flying wooden horse and a group of men who chases her by flying carpets. Flying carpet, iron ship, attacking giant birds, and the secret island - Many hardships remain ahead of him!.
